summary: This document is a chain of emails from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY) regarding travel approval requests for the Epstein investigation (2018R01618). It details logistical planning for trips to conduct victim interviews in locations including Stockholm, Sweden; Los Angeles; and West Palm Beach/Fort Lauderdale, Florida, spanning from March 2019 to February 2020.

connections.description: Both are part of the SDNY investigation team traveling for the Epstein case, as indicated in travel requests for victim interviews.

events.title: Planned Travel to Stockholm for Interview
events.description: SDNY investigation team plans to travel to Stockholm, Sweden, to conduct an interview related to the Epstein investigation.

events.title: Planned Travel to Los Angeles for Interview
events.description: SDNY investigation team requests permission to travel to Los Angeles for an interview (or interviews) related to the Epstein investigation.

events.title: Planned Travel to Los Angeles for Interview
events.description: SDNY investigation team requests permission to travel to Los Angeles for an interview related to the Epstein investigation.

events.title: Planned Travel to West Palm Beach for Interview
events.description: SDNY investigation team (specifically S and another unnamed individual) requests permission to travel to West Palm Beach for an interview related to the Epstein investigation.

events.title: Planned Travel to West Palm Beach for Meetings/Interviews
events.description: SDNY investigation team requests permission to travel to West Palm Beach for approximately three days for meetings and interviews with victims in the Epstein investigation.

events.title: Initial Travel Request for Epstein Investigation
events.description: S and another unnamed individual request permission for travel for the Epstein investigation (United States v. Epstein, 2018R01618) for meetings and interviews in West Palm Beach and/or Fort Lauderdale.

keyFacts: The document references the ongoing federal investigation 'United States v. Epstein, 2018R01618', relating to the enticement of minors for sexual activity.
The SDNY investigation team was actively conducting victim interviews in multiple domestic and international locations (Florida, California, Sweden) from at least March 2019 through February 2020.
Travel requests frequently include approval to reserve hotel conference rooms for conducting interviews, indicating formal, recorded proceedings.
The email chain reveals detailed logistical coordination and adherence to government travel policies (e.g., requiring refundable tickets for international travel).
Multiple individuals are involved in the investigation team, though most are referred to by initials or are unnamed in the released text.
